oracle.pg.hbase

Class OracleKeyFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.Filter
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.FilterBase
        • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.CompareFilter
          • oracle.pg.hbase.OracleKeyFilter

  • public class OracleKeyFilter
extends org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.CompareFilter
    This class extends the HBase CompareFilter to filter rows based on a specified key qualifier comparator and having a qualifier length greater than 0.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.CompareFilter
